prodNameC: "西門子" 恩奈格斯特 麻疹病毒IgM抗體 檢驗試劑組 (未滅菌)
ingredientsDesc: 1.Enzygnost® Anti-Measles Virus/IgM, test plate: Microtitration plate coated with inactivated measles virus antigen. The wells in the left row of each strip are coated with antigen derived from permanent simian kidney cells infected with measles virus, and the wells in the right row are coated with non-infected cells (=control antigen). 2.Anti-Human IgM/POD Conjugate: Goat antibodies to human IgM, conjugated with peroxidase and contained in 0.05 molar Tris/HCl buffer solution, pH 7.2, with 0.5% polygeline. The conjugate is coloured red.Dye:				approx. 400 mg/L Brilliant Ponceau.Preservative:		max. 1g/L phenol.3.Conjugate Buffer Microbiol: 37 mg of EDTA in a litre of 0.01 molar phosphate-buffered solution, pH 7.2, with approx. 2% Tetronic® and approx and approx. 1% BSA.Preservatives:		approx. 100 mg/L gentamicin, 				approx. 6 mg/lL5-chloro-2-methyl-isothiazole-3-one and 				approx. 2 mg/L 2-methyl-isothiazole-3-one4.Anti-Measles Virus Reference P/P: Human serum containing IgG antibodies to mea
applicantAddr: 台北市松山區塔悠路81號6樓之1
efficacy: 定性和定量檢測人類血清和血漿中麻疹病毒之特異性IgM抗體的酵素免疫分析法。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3520 麻疹病毒血清試劑
